p: HaCaT cells were cultured in Dulbecco’s Modified Eagle’s Medium (DMEM) (ThermoFisher, Life Technologies, Warsaw, Poland)) containing 10% FBS (ThermoFisher), 100 U/mL penicillin (ThermoFisher), and 100 ug/mL streptomycin (ThermoFisher) in 37 °C/5% CO 2. Prior to each experiment, the medium was changed to DMEM without any supplementation.
